View on GitHub

Eventualize is an opinionated event-sourcing framework that unlocks the untapped potential of transactional data while eliminating many challenges related to management of transactional data and its schema. Eventualize is quick & easy to integrate, and while it is working with new paradigms and patterns under the hood, it abstracts most of it away and does not distrupt development.

Quick Start

If you want to jump right into it, go to Quick Start

Learn More

If you want to learn more, go to Learn More.

Contribute

You can contribute to this project in many ways (not just coding)! If you are interested to learn more about how you can do this, please visit the Contribution page.
